definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to extort under false pretenses/to blackmail/to bluff/to defraud
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
unfounded rumor/to pass on a mistaken belief to others

sentences.english: There seems to always something wrong with this computer.
sentences.chinese: 来时这台电脑近似出舛讹了。

sentences.english: He did the kidnapping as a way of extorting money.
sentences.chinese: 他绑架的目的只是为了讹钱。

sentences.english: Don't misinform your doctor nor your lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 别向医生和律师提供舛讹的新闻。

sentences.english: Many people falsely believe that great intelligence is required to learn a new language.
sentences.chinese: 很多人讹相信伟大的情报是需要学习一门新的语言。

sentences.english: Such a small mistake is pardonable.
sentences.chinese: 不会追究犯了那么小的舛讹的。

sentences.english: It is quite common for youngsters to make such kind of mistake.
sentences.chinese: 小孩犯这种舛讹是较为罕见的。

definition: to extort under false pretenses/to blackmail/to bluff/to defraud
erhua variant of 碰瓷|碰瓷[peng4 ci2]

(coll.) to scam sb by setting up an "accident" in which one appears to have sustained damage or injury caused by the scam victim, then demanding compensation (variations include putting "expensive" porcelain in a place where it is likely to be knocked over by passers-by, and stepping into the path of a slow-moving car)
to settle privately/to solve behind closed doors/to settle out of court
lit. to strike with a muckrake (idiom), cf Pigsy 豬八戒|猪八戒 in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记; fig. to counterattack/to make bogus accusations (against one's victim)
extortion by taking advantage of sb's weakness
a financial loss may prevent disaster (idiom)
to cheat/to swindle/to pretend/to feign/to draw sb out/to try to extract information by deceit or bluff
